name: opcms
description: This test app created by React.js ![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/react.js-16.13.1-green) and RoR ![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/ror-5.2.4-green)

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
